asgn1SoccerCompetition

Class SoccerLeague

  • java.lang.Object
    • asgn1SoccerCompetition.SoccerLeague
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SportsLeague

    public class SoccerLeague
extends java.lang.Object
implements SportsLeague
    A class to model a soccer league. Matches are played between teams and points awarded for a win, loss or draw. After each match teams are ranked, first by points, then by goal difference and then alphabetically.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alan Woodley

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoccerLeague

        public SoccerLeague(int requiredTeams)
        Generates a model of a soccer team with the specified number of teams. A season can not start until that specific number of teams has been added. Once that number of teams has been reached no more teams can be added unless a team is first removed.
        Parameters:
        requiredTeams - The number of teams required/limit for the league.

    • Method Detail

      • registerTeam

        public void registerTeam(SoccerTeam team)
                  throws LeagueException
        Registers a team to the league.
        Parameters:
        team - Registers a team to play in the league.
        Throws:
        LeagueException - If the season has already started, if the maximum number of teams allowed to register has already been reached or a team with the same official name has already been registered.

      • removeTeam

        public void removeTeam(SoccerTeam team)
                throws LeagueException
        Removes a team from the league.
        Parameters:
        team - The team to remove
        Throws:
        LeagueException - if the season has not ended or if the team is not registered into the league.

      • getRegisteredNumTeams

        public int getRegisteredNumTeams()
        Gets the number of teams currently registered to the league
        Specified by:
        getRegisteredNumTeams in interface SportsLeague
        Returns:
        the current number of teams registered

      • getRequiredNumTeams

        public int getRequiredNumTeams()
        Gets the number of teams required for the league to begin its season which is also the maximum number of teams that can be registered to a league.
        Specified by:
        getRequiredNumTeams in interface SportsLeague
        Returns:
        The number of teams required by the league/maximum number of teams in the league

      • startNewSeason

        public void startNewSeason()
                    throws LeagueException
        Starts a new season by reverting all statistics for each team to initial values.
        Specified by:
        startNewSeason in interface SportsLeague
        Throws:
        LeagueException - if the number of registered teams does not equal the required number of teams or if the season has already started

      • endSeason

        public void endSeason()
               throws LeagueException
        Ends the season.
        Specified by:
        endSeason in interface SportsLeague
        Throws:
        LeagueException - if season has not started

      • isOffSeason

        public boolean isOffSeason()
        Specifies if the league is in the off season (i.e. when matches are not played).
        Specified by:
        isOffSeason in interface SportsLeague
        Returns:
        True If the league is in its off season, false otherwise.

      • getTeamByOfficalName

        public SoccerTeam getTeamByOfficalName(java.lang.String name)
                                throws LeagueException
        Returns a team with a specific name.
        Parameters:
        name - The official name of the team to search for.
        Returns:
        The team object with the specified official name.
        Throws:
        LeagueException - if no team has that official name.

      • playMatch

        public void playMatch(java.lang.String homeTeamName,
                      int homeTeamGoals,
                      java.lang.String awayTeamName,
                      int awayTeamGoals)
               throws LeagueException
        Plays a match in a specified league between two teams with the respective goals. After each match the teams are resorted.
        Specified by:
        playMatch in interface SportsLeague
        Parameters:
        homeTeamName - The name of the home team.
        homeTeamGoals - The number of goals scored by the home team.
        awayTeamName - The name of the away team.
        awayTeamGoals - The number of goals scored by the away team.
        Throws:
        LeagueException - If the season has not started or if both teams have the same official name.

                      throws LeagueException

        Throws:
